com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.factory.attributevalue

Class DynamoDBAttributeValueHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.factory.attributevalue.DynamoDBAttributeValueHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultDynamoDBAttributeValueHandler, NumberDynamoDBAttributeValueHandler

    public abstract class DynamoDBAttributeValueHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A handler that is responsible for building an AttributeValue for DynamoDB access.

      • buildValue

        public com.amazonaws.services.dynamodbv2.model.AttributeValue buildValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Build the dynamo DB compatible value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to build into AttributeValue.
        Returns:
        The AttributeValue that has been built. A null value will be returned if there is no applicable handler.
